option.value: Assembles and tests this project.

option.value: Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

option.value: Deploys WAR to remote container.

option.value: Starts the container, deploys WAR to it and wait for the user to press CTRL + C to stop.

option.value: Starts the container, deploys WAR to it and then do other tasks (for example, execute tests).

option.name: description
option.value: Stops local container.

option.name: description
option.value: Undeploys WAR from remote container.

option.value: Runs all checks.
